title: Ovzon’s first broadband satellite reaches geostationary slot
summary: Ovzon’s first fully owned satellite has reached its geostationary position after a five-month journey in space and passed initial health checks, the Swedish broadband operator announced.

title: Webinar – Race to the Moon

title: Boeing and NASA delay Starliner astronaut return to June 22, nearly doubling mission length
summary: Boeing’s Starliner capsule “Calypso” will stay at the International Space Station twice as long as the mission originally planned, NASA announced Friday.
